name: Circus Barkley
description:
BETTER PLAYED ON DOWNLOADABLE VERSION

Controls: Left and right to move, up to jump, down to fast fall. Enter for restart.

Avoid the spikey balls, hit them with the ball to take them out, collect coins.

Credits:

Game Design/Rogramming ( Enzo Gaiero AKA FrenziedPlatypus)

Art(Javier Leal)

Music(Santiago Ramos)
